title: Lauren Sanchez Wears Sheer Animal-Print Dress to Dinner with Husband Jeff Bezos in Saint-Tropez | Jeff Bezos, Lauren Sanchez | Just Jared: Celebrity News and Gossip | Entertainment
text:
Lauren Sanchez Wears Sheer Animal-Print Dress to Dinner with Husband Jeff Bezos in Saint-Tropez
Lauren Sanchez and Jeff Bezos are honeymooning all over the South of France!
The newlyweds were all smiles as they arrived at Cherry restaurant for dinner on Wednesday evening (July 23) in Saint-Tropez, France.
For their night out, the 55-year-old journalist and author wore a black, sheer animal-print dress while the 61-year-old Amazon founder wore a navy, velvet polo shirt, gray pants, and green sneakers.
Earlier in the day, Lauren, in a white dress and straw visor, was all smiles as she and a friend stepped out to do some shopping.
The day before, Lauren was seen in a black dress and big black hat as she and Jeff headed back to their yacht after enjoying a meal with friends at the exclusive Club 55.
Earlier in the week, Lauren was seen wearing a straw hat and black mini dress as she and Jeff stepped out for lunch at La GuÃ©rite in Cannes.
The couple married in a lavish, star-studded wedding late last month on the island of San Giorgio Maggiore in Venice, Italy.
In a new interview, one of their famous guests revealed if they had to sign NDAs in order to attend the wedding.
